LanguageData.SPBD_PlutoSerum.label: pluto serum
LanguageData.SPBD_PlutoSerum.description: A purple serum made from refining ivy fruits. It has been shown to cause hyper-alertness and euphoria, while also seemingly improving shooting accuracy; however, it's use is frowned upon due to how dangerous it is.\n\nDo not use this drug recklessly. Its effects are irreversible.
